I always buy these when buying batteries because they work just as well and they are lower in price!Purchased as back-up batteries, with expiration of December 2018. Last night, I offered 2 packages for family member. Did not expect see acid.Nice little bundle for those dark moments. Have not used it yet, but feels good to have it around just in case.I ordered storm bundles for our home and my family. The bundles are a great value. Just in checking at a few local stores the lanterns alone cost almost as much as the entire bundle. They are light-weight and easy to store as they are not big, but they give off BIG light. The little flashlights included really mark the way, of course we tested everything out. AND they come with batteries that you can trust to get the job done. I am not looking forward to having the power go out, but when it does we are ready, especially given how long of time it seems each time the power goes out for them to get it fixed. I gave sets to elderly parents too as they are easy for them to hold and use. One press of the button for bright light, 2 quick presses for dimmer light, and press and hold for the strobe light (just press again to stop it). The little flashing red light makes it easy to see in the dark. Changing the batteries is a bit of a challenge, but everyone practiced a couple of times so when we need to in the dark it won't be an issue. Just turn the bottom off then match of the arrowed notches to get it back together. Best investment I could make. I don't have to worry about dripping candles or fires with these. We bought 2 bundles per household. Thinking about getting more.No better deal anywhere for such quality at an affordable price! Will be getting more for family and friends... You won't be sorry!!!feel more secure and prepared having this storm bundle handy.The Lanterns are great. They throw off alot of light. Really light up a room. Highly recommend them.
The glow in the dark flashlights are good but they do not glow like I would have expected.One of the flash light defected and still waited for a replacement to send this one backThe lantern gives off plenty of light for our need during power losses at home. The flashlights also give of a good beam of light and they appear very durable. The package came to us very quickly.lantern: very hard to open battery housing. Its just a large flash light.
Not worthy of the nameThis lantern is small but has great light output that is comparable to larger ones.Already had the older model and the new model is just as great. Very bright lantern with a neat locator light. Great product. Have not tried the flashlight yet.We have bought the Storm preparedness bundle before and we absolutely appreciate it for how efficient it is and how inexpensive it is! It is an extremely wonderful value for what it offers. We take the lantern and the flashlights with us to third world countries and even in the US, we know we'll be prepared when we will need light. Thanks, Rayovac!I really like the LED lights. The lantern is not big, but gives out a lot of nice, white light. This means it is easy to find a place to put it. The 2 small flashlights also put out a lot of light and can be stored in a car glove compartment or pocket. Part of the small flashlight housing emits a faint glow after use so you can locate it.Overall, wonderful products.Of course Rayovac batteries are one of the best, made in the USA, excellent life. I was extremely disappointed to see the flashlights and lantern were made in China. The lantern had no directions and it is supposed to have 3 settings, strobe, low and high. The one I got only has strobe and high. I presume high since I don't know what low looks like. I would not have bought this package if I knew the non-consumable items were made overseas.Great value. Lantern is nice and bright but I wish it was a little larger. Otherwise, the package is perfect!I had a friend recommend this lantern. When I went on line to purchase I saw it was sold as a storm preparedness kit. I bought two it was close to fathers day so I gave one to my son in law. The light is perfect for a picinic table or remove the shade and hang by the hook. Great product. Will say buy on line I shopped locally it was almost twice as much.Lantern is very small. Was expecting something a bit bigger for a battery operated lantern. Flashlights are good for a pocket size light. Not sure yet how long a set of batteries will last. It would be more upfront if you would give the product measurements instead of just the lumens. Most people don't know 1 lumen from the 240 lumen light you sold me. The 240 sounds great but in reality it is not a great amount of light. I put I would recommend, just be aware of what you are buying.When I first opened the package I was a little taken back by the size of the lantern. I couldn't believe that something that small would be as bright as it is. Boy was I wrong, that lantern is brighter than any propane one I have ever used. Plus it is compact, lightweight and extremely durable. The best thing I love about Rayovac products is their fantastic customer service and I think it is great when a company stands behind their products like they do. I am a Rayovac customer for life!Ideal small lantern for power outages. Pleased with the purchase.I mainly purchased this bundle for the lantern, as I had read many positive reviews on various sites. The lantern itself was smaller than I anticipated, but it is definitely bright. The fact that the globe easily comes off and allows it to be hung upside down is a plus. Getting the two extra flashlights (which are pretty decent) and all the batteries was just an added bonus. Why not 5 stars? Two reasons - the red LED that is supposed to blink all the time to allow you to find the lantern in the dark does not work on the one I received. Not a big deal for me, but that might be pretty important to someone else. Second, I have not used it enough to test the claimed battery life.
All in all, though, I would definitely recommend this bundle to a friend.Love this set. The lantern which is tricky to open and insert batteries is wonderful. We are going to really enjoy this come summer time. and the little flash lights are small tho oh so powerful...Very good products for the money. I bought two bundles and I consider it almost a steal at the price I paid. Thanks Ray-O-Vac!Every thing you need for emergencys, the lantern really bright and usefull.LED lighting technology has greatly improved over the last few years. The lantern in this kit is a great example of that. I bought this Storm Preparedness Bundle primarily for the lantern. The batteries and flashlights were a "bonus". The lantern is very bright and way better than any lantern I've ever used. Of course, a Coleman gas lantern is brighter, but who wants to deal with all the negatives that go along with it? The beauty of LED lighting is efficiency. LED's consume something like 7 times less energy than conventional lighting. When you're without electricity #especially for a long period of time#, this is the lantern you want. I even saw this lantern in a popular home improvement magazine where it was praised as being the best on the market. By the way, have you priced "D" batteries lately? They ain't cheap, so the "D" batteries in this bundle must be considered when you realize what a great deal this is. The flashlights appear to be made well and although there are much better flashlights on the market, the included flashlights will get the job done and are just plain handy. Buy it! You won't be disappointed :-)I like that it is small but give out a lot of light and use only 3 of D batteryThis is well made and puts out alot of light for a small lantern.Bought this Storm Preparedness Bundle after Super Storm Sandy since we live in a coastal area that frequently loses power. Was impressed with the quality of the lantern, its brightness and portability. Very easy to install batteries and only uses 3 D cell rather than 4 or more that other lanterns require. The two small flashlights included in this package are perfect for your pocket or purse, plus they are quite attractive (lime green and pink). When you consider this package also included a package of(4) D cell batteries, it was a very good deal!However even though it says 300 lumens on the packaging you will be delivered one that says 240 lumens. I have tried twice. But the lantern provide plenty of light. It will light up a good sized room vs a flashlight. I am hard to please, but I am satisfied. I am ordering another one.This is a small lantern but powerful. I bought the lantern that uses 8 D batteries. This lantern is almost as powerful, uses less batteries and last longer. It's also small. I bought 4. Kept two and gave two as gifts. Wort the cost.I loved the bundle so much, I had to get a second. The lantern is very bright and has different hanging options. I also enjoy the smaller flashlights that glow in the dark. It is well worth the money!After Hurrican Sandy I knew I need some additonal lighting for when the electric was off. I purchased one lantern, when I saw how much light it delivered I purchased several more for my family. Lots of light for a little lantern. All ready for the next storm.good brightness-good quality product-good value-used for giftsThe Latern works better than expected, It's really bright for the price.After having the scare of my life with Hurricane Sandy, I ordered the Storm Preparedness Bundle so I would be ready for the next weather disaster.

I was pleasantly surprised that the 2 small flash lights in the bundle have pretty strong beams for their size. The lantern, also has a nice strong beam that I hope will last, if I should need to use it in the future.I feel that even though the overall package is a good value, I think the lantern is overpriced.
I am concerned that the constant blinking light will cause the batteries to prematurely discharge.The Lantern, and Flashlights are made very well, and also has a powerfull light. The price for it all can't be beat. The only problem was no instructions of how to put the batteries in the Lantern. I had to scout this site, and, lo and behold I found the instructions by accident.
You twist the bottom off....put the batteries in then line up the red and white arrows to twist the bottom back on. You must use some pushing down force when putting this lid back on.
Oh! the Lantern takes only 3 batteries, so you get one extra.
Too bad we didn't have this when we were hit with Hurricane Sandy.
I gave it 4 stars because no instructions were enclosed.just as advertized. bright enough . no frills
just light.

name: Red Dead Redemption 2: Ultimate Edition
review: Constantly glitches.  None of the special benefits showed up and I'm constantly stuck with a nag.  Weapons selection keeps changing randomly without command.  Constantly swaps server and loses progress and randomly loses stuff.  It's like playing a game from the 1980s, frustrating as *censored for profanity*this was such an awesome game it really got you to not only appreciate the story but the lay of the lands and how beautiful the game is but the game play is satisfying too

name: Remnant: From the Ashes - PlayStation 4
review:
From the review title I haven’t played it yet but it does look super fun and I can’t wait to play it GameStop is always good to me the employees take time to listen to me and understand what I’m looking for I don’t shop anywhere else unless they don’t carry a game I’m looking for I’ll recommend GameStop to absolutely everybodyGood game would recommend, always start games at the hardest difficulty so when you complete it you feel an immense amount of accomplishment. Probably why I don’t feel accomplishedU should play it if u like single player games or coopBest game ever.. challenging game play it will test your skills.Very tough boss fights but gets better as you upgrade your weapons. A lot of great creatures and amazing landscapes. Very fun to play with a lot of cool items and weapons.This is a fantastic game!!  We are having a blast playing the whole game together me and my family and friends. We are doing campaign and survival mode. 
If you are a dark souls fan, this is a MUST HAVE!!!!!
If you are not a dark souls fan, this is still a MUST HAVE!!!!The graphics, game play, and level design for Remnant are a bit clunky/dated if you are used to top-tier releases, but I was willing to ignore all that for the sake of a great story.  The bits and pieces of information you can gather early in the game are really intriguing, which made me eager to plow ahead.  But after trying (and failing) the first boss fight 40 or 50 times, it's just not worth it.  I tried the boss solo 10-15 times, and with two others another 30 times or so.  Never got more than about halfway.  Explosive enemies just pop up out of nowhere, with virtually no warning, every few minutes.  I don't understand these games that think "difficulty" equals "fun" (or "good").  It's just absurd.  Considering how many games are available (and fun), it just wasn't worth it to keep pounding my head against the wall.Fun game. Weapon variety and boss variety. Different worlds. Definitely a must haveConstantly get kicked off, unable to host or join. Can’t like a game if I can’t play it. When they update I’ll take this review down.To easy even when set to harder settings. After playing for an hour really wanted a refund.It is really fun but it feels like multiplayer is almost required for some bossesIf you are familiar with dark souls or bloodborn you will enjoy this and add it to your collection, gameplay smooth and graphics are nice.

name: STORY OF SEASONS: Friends of Mineral Town  - PlayStation 4
review: i'm a big fan of story of seasons and mineral town was one of my favourites, so i'm not disappointed here! would absolutely recommend it to anyone who likes the series and wants an updated throwback to the older versions of the series. now i really hope they bring more of them onto ps4 thoughI have really enjoyes this game. I had played before on Switch but now i have trophies!Once Marvelous departed from Natsume, they were able to return us to Mineral Town with this release, originally on Switch. As a choice between male or female, take over your grandfather's old farm and make a name for yourself, befriending the villagers and growing crops your own way, and enjoy new quality of life features while missing some old ones.Great Game, reminds me more of the Harvest Moon N64 Days, great artworkTake this with a grain of salt as I've never played the original version. But it's a perfectly serviceable SOS game; pretty fun, addicting even, but doesn't go out of it's way to be anything spectacular. The character portraits are great, but the 3D models are sub par. The gameplay is fun and gives you plenty to do and unlock, but the Fatigue animations have no right being that long and often, and seems it was only put in there to pad out the game and/or annoy you. There are also issues of you getting stuck in your horse after you dismount, and getting blocked by villagers (you have to wiggle to get unstuck) which could've been avoided if they made the hitboxes a little smaller. As much as I criticize; I still get a lot of enjoyment out of it. I love taking care of my animals and wooing the bachelors/bachelorettes (the dialogue is cute and funny too). If you like the SOS or the HM series I believe you will enjoy it; it's just a shame that it's pretty bare bones.

name: Samsung 49-in Super Ultra-Wide Dual QHD (5120x1440) 120Hz Curved Gaming Monitor C49RG9
review:
the picture is absolutely phenomenal!  this with my evga nvidia rtx 3080 ti ftw32 ultra makes for a riveting experience!  but, alas, it has a quirk...
the annoying thing is the faint intermittent "crack" coming out of the left & right speaker alternatingly.  i wouldn't care because i have a 5.1 sound system, but it unmutes itself  and begins to crack again.  thought it might be the firmware & driver, so i updated the firmware and installed the driver and it still does it.
i chatted and was told that it might be a warranty issue and i got the number for support.  i haven't contacted support yet, but i will update when i get off the phone with them tomorrow.this monitor is beast. i will never switch it with any other monitor, worth the money.this is just an amazing monitor.  it really has transformed how i work and game.  productivity is high because i can have multiple websites open, as well as have all my applications on screen at once.  no more dual monitors.  
and gaming!  just awesome to have such a huge view.  from fps to driving to rts, it is amazing how much i can see.  i highly recommend having a beefy gpu to run it at anything above 120hz and ultra settings, like a rtx3090.  if you can afford it, get this monitor.  you won't regret it![This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is perfect for the gmaing experience, screen is so large, visual spectable is beyond my expectation. It is also a great monitor for having multiple pages open. I can have 4 pages of notes open simultaneously with no problem. I did have to adjust the font size for this type of operation, but once adjusted, everything is great.

Here's why the monitor looses a star. When you are looking around (changing the viewpoint) in flight simulation, the outer quarters to thirds of screen will begin to distort and elongate. Box came in with no damage and obviously never opened before. So I was happy with that. Assembly was quick and easy. Never actually touched the display until it was on my desk. Then I noticed huge hand prints all over the left and right edges of screen. There were not bare oily hand prints, more dusty glove prints from whoever packaged it. A quick dust off with microfiber cleaned them right up. Struggled a lot with the provided cables. Power is only 5 feet. Considering the routing in the back panel and through the mount's arm, nearly 2 feet are already gone. So you better have an outlet nearby. DP, HDMI and USB cables are 6 feet each. Pretty standard but again, this monitor is huge; 4 feet across so again with the routing through the back panel and arm, there' no a whole lot of room to do good cable management. But, with a bit of patience and reorganizing the desk, all worked out fine. Then I plugged it in the PC using the provided DP cable, wow was I amazed at the.... I paid a premium for this monitor expecting a high-quality, high-performing, reliable monitor. Now, it is useless. I do not recommend this product.i purchased this monitor last year, and now two months after the warranty expired, the bottom of the screen all of a sudden has flickering lines on start up  when it has been powered off for some time! i am not sure how when or why this occurred but i think your better off buying that expensive acer one the first time rather then this and then another a year after you buy it. i do not have a photo of it right this second but as soon as i start up again tomorrow ill grab one.this is a great monitor for gaming, has its 144hz which is fantastic. i didn't read what it works best with. the worse part is the jog button right after the year warranty the jog button software no longer works right. up doesnt work, left works, down is right and right is down. i can get it to work after shutting down and back on, spamming the jog button, when i managed to get the button to work a reset and did find the software update for it but no go. make sure there is no jog button on your next monitor!i was absolutely blown away when i first logged into warzone with this baby! all of my lag was from my other monitor! it really does eliminate lag! foa went up by 30-40 too! thanks samsung! you the mvpthis monitor reminds me of the imposter and it makes me happy i play amongus on the 240 hz :dthis product is really great but i dont know how to fix the motion blur and it makes the game look really ugly and it would be really helpful if someon can help methe monitor will not recognize my hdmi signal when computer wakes up.  it totally stopped working. sent it back for repair and it is doing it again.granted, this isn't a ultra gaming monitor, so it doesn't have amazing specs, but it's a great value for it's price. 144 hrz made a big difference. my only complaint is that the stand is kind of oddly shaped, so it has a hard time sitting flush with my desk. all the weight seems to sit at the front of the stand, so i'm confused why it goes back like 5 inches. would also be nice if there was some sort of mounting hookup.i bought this monitor for my lenovo gaming lap top and since i purchased it here have been playing on it a lot. plus i have a samsung telephone and a samsung smart watch as well. i have samsung tablet as well but my grandson cracked the screen on it so i rarely use it any more. i am very happy with all of my samsung products that i have purchased, am looking forward to buying me a samsung big screen  television sometime next year.the monitor is great picture is clear and crisp. the only reason i gave it 4 stars is the should be flush or the monitor should come with appropriate hardware for mounting.[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] what an amazing display, i just looks so nice when i set it up and connected it to my pc. also the refresh rate was amazing, i have only ever had a 60hz refresh rate, but this looks amazing.so this is my first gaming monitor and i must say i am highly impressed. can't wait to see what the series x looks like this weekthis is an amazing gaming monitor and more.  has presets to match the type of game you're playing, the movie you're watching, or stream you're broadcasting. 
i'm so glad i purchased this monitor and will recommend it for sure.when this was opened up out of the box it worked fine, then a few hours later a single line came down across the screen. i was able to send it back and they didn't charge me for it which is nice. i get it back and it is working great for a week or so, then i hit the <printscreen> key on my keyboard and that line is there in the same exact spot. i checked my cables, even took a screenshot and it wasn't there in the screenshot. this was a huge disappointment for me, especially since it took 2 weeks for the monitor to come back. i can;t recommend this to anyone knowing that they might experience the same issue, either by random chance or one wrong key press.never buy this monitor. jog button that use to  control main menu does not work all the time. i have to send it bout again for 2nd time services in just couple months . and you have to wait almost 3 weeks to get it back. terrible and big mistake when i bought this monitori can't mout this monitor which really sucks. every vesa mount i've tried is too big because the area where the mounting plate got is so poorly designed. do you have any recommendations for vesa mounts that actually fit???this samsung monitor is a joke.  stay away.  they're trying to dump them.  after 60 days, this went bad out of buying 4!  new.  screen went yellow and they tried to fix it.  takes a month.  still not fixed.  they're customer service is another joke.  they want you to waste more time trying to get it repaired a second time before they replace it. 
 the repair facility in new jersey is another joke.  they will waste your time and sell you garbage.decent 144hz gaming monitor for the price, only problem with it is, there is are small but  noticeable pressure mark on the bottom right of the displayi'm leaving a 5 star review because this monitor rocks for the price. also, someone left a review for not being able to mount the monitor...that person must not have known what they were doing...easy to mount just use spacers to clear the shroud, not very hard unless you make it hard.the monitor is good. 
the va panel looks great, the calibration of colors is great out of the box. the curve of the screen is good.
can't say much about the stand because i use wallmount on my monitors.it has been two week since i purchase and the button power/menu button started to have issue. g-sync is it working? don't know cause i still see break in the image where g-sync suppose to smooth it out. the menu sometime can't be read. turning it off is sometime a pain.Hi.  I purchased this monitor specifically because it is listed as Gsync Compatible, and it is verfied by Nvidia as Gsync Compatible.  Its great when its close to the refresh rate.  However, some games that when the Frame Rates go below 100, or even 120 - 144hz, there is terrible ghosting and blurriness when Gsync is on.  Why is this?  If its officially Gsync Compatible, then there should be no ghosting as according to Gsync Compatibiltiy, Gsync should work 1-240 Hz on this.    Perfect example:  In Overwatch, during the menu screen, Blizzard caps it at 60FPS.  There you can see terible purple ghosting on the characters or letters on the menu when they move, when they are on a darker background.  Otherwise during game when you reach high refresh rate to 240hz, its fine.

The monitor does have excellent colors and contrast, and it is indeed fast for a curved VA monitor.

 The only way to stop it, is to TURN OFF Gsync and ghosting goes away.  But why should I need to do this?  I bought an official Gsync Monitor to -- yes you guess it! --  use Gsync!  When will Samsung acknowledge this issue with this monitor?great price and great design but did not display 144hz without problems, tried several different displayport cables with a gtx 1070 that was not overclocked. could not push past 85hz settings on PC without red flickering pixels and artifact. RMA submitted.I'm enjoying the monitor as a whole. Like the curve, like the 240Hz but G- Sync should not be printed on this monitor. It does not work. Idk if it's an adaptive-Sync issue or a Samsung issue but, it's very misleading.Overall performance is fine; but horrible overshoot with freesync, gsync.
2 months after my purchase got 2 dead pixelsFalse advertising, this monitor is not suitable for gaming and 144 Hz refresh rate will not help. Low price, poor image quality, issues with DP connection, no DP cable.Ghosting has been a huge issue which I - only just now - solved.  The solve? Turn off G-Sync. The problem may be caused by using a AMD video card that is just old enough to not have drivers that are able to use the (now) open source encoding for G-Sync. 
While the colors are fantastic (purple is the best example of rich color on this display), the refresh rate makes great use of my high end video card, and the curve is set to the exact distance for optimal viewing, and the contrast is sharp as a knife, the ghosting was so bad while gaming and watching movies the monitor was nearly unusable for anything that has high contrast smooth motion.  Scrolling on web pages showed little to no signs of ghosting at all. But, motion in gaming was deeply "haunted".Monitor works great at 240 fps. Very clear, and only a little ghosting but not too noticeable in game. On games that dip at about 100fps or lower, you can get weird imaging issues even with adaptive sync on. It is probably due to the screen tearing that would normally be there, but adaptive sync is trying to manage. So make sure you are changing the graphics settings on games optimal to performance on your PC to use the full 240 fps. That's where this monitor will shine, obviously! 

Va panel looks great, blacks are really good. The curve of the screen is not too crazy and is actually pretty nice.

The stand only lets you have a little vertical tilt, no height adjustment. I would definitely recommend purchasing a monitor arm to adjust height if you need that.this is a high performance slick design monitor its supprisingly  good for the price it can game it stream and it is a great buy the resolution is perfect as well and the 144hz refresh rate is super cleanI BOUGHT THIS YESTERDAY FOR MY GAMING IT IS A AMAZING MONITOR FOR GAMING THE RESPONSE TIME IS REALLU. FAST I RECOMMEND IT[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Because habe good resulution and it dont expensive

name: Senran Kagura Peach Beach Splash - No Shirt, No Shoes, All Service Edition
review:
It says it's the No Shoes No Shirt All Service edition but it's the standard edition. This is to be expected for a pre-owned game, but it shouldn't be advertised this way.Just look at box, if you buy this for anything other than spraying water on anime girls with tig ol' bitties, then why else would you buy it for? There's a target audience for this type of game and I can guarantee you if you are in this audience then buy it, if not go play some other genre.I'm enjoying the characters, the combat is fun, and I don't feel like I'm fighting the mechanics.If you love anibewbies you’ll love this game. But for real gameplay is actually fun, simple and addicting.I'm gay and people question why i play games like this, its so i can see all my weeb straight friends faces when certain parts happen, ha!I don't really play first person shooter games, but I like how gameplay is here.Glad I dived back into this series with this installment. It’s very different than previous titles, for good measure to really mix it up. I figured it would be similar to Splatoon, however it stands on its own.Great 3rd person shooter, if you play it for that.Great game, recommended by employee at Monroe street store, clocked in 30 plus hours so far.Love the art.  Lots of skin.  PlayStation had to censor parts because SJWsMediocre gameplay with mediocre story. The girls are very pretty though.Gameplay isnt amazing but it delivers the same perv joy as the rest of the series.Great fan service, underwhelming gameplay. Played it a bit and felt it lacking where triple A third person FPS thriveEnjoyable and fun. Love the art style and happy go lucky gameplay.This game has good graphics and i like the characters and there clotingGot the game as a joke stream, i knew what i was getting myself into. However i bought the game new and it didnt come with any codes.All the fanservice you could possibly ask for and as a casual in the anime world I can say I was very overwhelmed in a positive way when playing this game with my friends a full 10 out of 10This game takes all the humor and strange situations, (and fanservice) of the Senran Kagura franchise and brings it to the TPS genre. The game is very fun and has a solid combat system that once again shows that the people who make this franchise know how to make a good game, fanservice or not. While it doesn't push the PS4 to the edge, it looks great and plays at a solid 60fps. While some content will not be for everybody, it will prove to be an immense delight to any fan of the franchise, or really anyone who loves these wired, quirky, niche, Japanese titles.Amazing Japanese third person shooter with good story to itawesome game. good combat and sweet visuals. absolutely brilliant.The game gets a bit repetitive, but its a good, fun time killer. Its Absolutely fan service, and definitly not for the younger crowd as the "humiliation" move thing is pretty Lewd, so you wouldnt want your kiddos playing it probably. But over all pretty good, though not sure it $40 worth of good, had it not come with the extras, id for sure say not. Still a fun game though for Anime fans.I wanted to try something new and Senran Kagura has become my latest addiction! (in a good way). Honestly I didnt care for the characters but after putting in alot of hours (with ESTIVAL Versus) I learn more about the characters and their backstories without even playing the original titles! I highly recommend the game if you enjoy games like Naruto Storm series and DOA with an all female cast!For the price it is you get a really good art book with alot of pages and each picture is great on every page. Also the soundtrack cd is also worth it as it has 47 tracks and each song is pretty goodThis game is a blast to play, there is a VR mode included in the game which is a plus. The dead or alive characters as add on content is a bonus and reasonably priced. If you like Splatoon and anime girls in various swimsuits and styles then I highly recommend this title.the game is great the graphics are amazing but the game is very unbalanced and need to be worked on but over than that I love itIf you like cute girls and squirt guns this is seriously the game for ya. Silly fun and a vacation away from home.What was promised? Fanservice. They promised anime girls in bikinis having water gun fights. Don't expect something that will change gaming forever like Assassins Creed or Grand Theft Auto. The game delivers what it promised and is a lot of fun. The game is rated M so keep that in mind.Splatoon-like shooter, but with anime girls. Definitely not for everyone and full of fanservice .I'm not the best at expressing, so I will just say I enjoy the aesthetics, and the characters, but especially the game-play. Which to me makes it the most fun, since it literally is to me a fast paste third person shooter with lots of cool characters + fan-service.Fun game, more games need to be lighthearted and include this amount of extra content - artbooks, CD and Blu-ray of videosThis game is everything I hoped it would be and more.I bought this game a week ago and have not stopped playing it
Who would with all the water fightsBought this game over a week ago, and it was a fun, goofy time! Sure, there are voluptuous ninjas that lose clothing when they are defeated (my wife flipped out at this LOL), but the game is surprisingly deep. There is a lot of strategy involved when it comes to attacking, weapons, reloading and timing, as well as the fast paced nature of the game. Single player campaigns will help you unlock more ability cards, weapons and assist pets, but the real fun is online. My only gripe is that like many games from Japan, there is WAY TOO MUCH DLC that one has to buy to access more perks and costumes, as well as additional characters. All in all, it is a fun game.

P.S.: Dressing room mode is kind of...weird. You'll see what I mean LOL...Okay, political ramblings aside, this is nearly the ultimate in fanservice. Japanese anime schoolgirls in swimmy suits shooting water guns at each other 3rd person areba shooter style. Splatoon 2 with bewbs. This is where most people would say, "I normally don't buy these types of games but I had to for the artistic merits and incredible story." Not me. I like anything controversial and everything that goes against what the powers that be say is wrong, inappropriate, or politically incorrect. (I am also a fan of pretty anime schoolgirls and I do not apologize for that!)  I should probably mention this right now,  I hate Sony and I hate PlayStation for reasons I will not go into here. Let's just say fool me once shame on me, fool me 126 times, it must be Sony. I gave up fighting Sony and we finally bought a PS4 this year. I still hate Sony but I was missing out on too many games by fighting against them.  So I went over to the dark side, and it wasn't so bad after all. While Xbox still has it's amazing perks and features not found on PS4, I have found that Sony does some things Xbox has failed to do. What they do is JRPGS, fan service games, side scrolling shooters, and most importantly physical releases of games and true exclusives without the "Play Anywhere" pandering to the PC Master Race that Xbox does. Several of my favorite B-movie style games are PS4 exclusives, Onechanbara, Earth Defence Force, etc.which were formally Xbox 360 exclusive titles. The likes of Hatsune Miku and the Tales of... Series, among many others, are only found on PS4. Then there's Senran Kagura, and many others, in oversized collectors edition boxes. I loves me some collectors editions! Xbox has none anymore. While both companies are trying to force everyone to buy digital only games, it's great that PS4 hasn't yet crossed the line and Eliminated collectors editions.  I know this was supposed to be a review of Peach Beach Splash, but the game really speaks for itself. A fairly good tps with loads of fan service and a funny script.  The real point of this review is to state that it's time to urge others to buy both consoles this generation, just as we have in the past generations. Xbox has an amazing Backwards Compatibility library and some truly great games, Sony has the Japanese games library and some huge exclusives. Then there's Switch.... All I can say is there's potential there, and some day it will be worth buying. It's time to stop being fanboys and love both systems... Or in my case, tolerate the other's existence.I just really think this could have been better. The title before this one is a little better. Finding someone online to play with can take a while. (Most likely because not many people play it.) English voice acting could have gotten  you more into the story. It's hard to survive and read subtitles at the same time. However if you like up grading guns and characters only, you will love this. Because that's all I do.Cute chicks with water guns . Enough said . Not a game for kids btw. The gameplay is actually addicting (I was surprised too)i just got it 3 days ago after updating witch only took about 15 min with good net speed i played it and have to say it is a great addition to the s.k family giving a new look on things as well as a more chill feel only bad part in my opinion is that theirs no English even though you can tell the voice actors triedAre you kidding me? No...REALLY?? If you've allready played any of the Senran Kagura titles, you've allready preordered this puppy :p

If you're new, here's all you ned to know: 
-Hot Girls
-Frantic 3rd person shooter
-Hot Girls
-Adorable animated cutscenes, original Japanese VO
-HOT GIRLS!! In BIKINIS!!!!!!

name: Sony PlayStation 5 HD Camera
review:
Camera is nice but doesn’t work with VR since the PS5 doesn’t recognize it as a PS camera.If you want to stream with it, the camera will be on your monitor as well blocking gameplayThis is a nice quality product it does everything it says it is my only issue and the reason why I returned it is I thought it was for the PS VR you do not need this and it does not work for the PS VR.The PS5 camera is amazing and so easy to use I think anyone that streams off PS5 should have one!!Bought this for a buddy since he was twitch streaming w just a mic, he loves it as do I bc I get to see his pretty lil face now. Ohhh an btw this literally shipped in a day. He was goin in vaca for the weekend and it showed up a half hour before he left. Seriously excellent timing GameStop!Good quality and picks up position of player without moving the camera. Key featureIt's great! My only complaint would be is that there is no mic for the camera. Other then that, the visual quality of the camera is pretty great, I love it!The thing is not compatible with PS4 games that need a camera!sony is the best, quality picture from a name you can trust.This thing works great and matches perfectly with the PS5.Kids are so happy to have the PS5 and its accessories.  Gamestop customer service has been outstanding and we cannot be happier.Not bad at all....just add lighting & its a winnerThe shipping and delivery was perfect, arrived earlier than expected and works well. Has helped make my stream feel more personal and professional. Wish that it was able to zoom more, but that is a minor gripe and not the fault of GameStop.It does what it states. Although, it would have been nice if they had thought ahead and added additional features and components to it. A mic would have been great. Ability to incorporate it into your VR setup would have also been a great addition.
Maybe they have already considered these type of additions and could be planning to add them in to a new version to go with their next PSVR headset. If so, hopefully they can make their next headset wireless. The size and style of it are well thought out so that it doesn't take up a lot of space as well as matches the design and color scheme of the PS5. 
Either way, this is worth buying if you are mainly interested in streaming, while using a headset with mic or just a stand alone mic.Great starter camera for streaming. Great 1080p Quality!Very goodI plugged it into the PS5 and nothing happens. I can not get ut to work.It doesn't work trying too get invoice too take it backMy son loves the camera. He uses it to stream while playing on his PS 5.I have not used it yet as I am waiting to purchase my PS5. It has a good build quality and looks awesome.The ps4 camera was better honestly, the took the mic off of the camera which was super useful. Other than that it's alright I guess.The mechanism that holds the camera up can be adjusted easily as a stand. Picture quality is just “ok” but it gets the job done. Make sure you have enough lighting ro give the image quality the best chance.I wanted this camera so I could continue streaming like I did with my PS4. The camera itself is great! Quality is lovely, the features are cool if you have a set up with a green screen. However, the PS5 streaming UI is horrible. I much preferred PS4's. So, I've opted for getting a capture card to stream via PC.

This camera cannot be used on a PC despite being a USB camera. So now it's literally useless to me. Sad, because I really do love it.The camera is cool and looks great. Although it shows a slight difference from the PS3 & PS4 cameras. But it goes well looks wise with the PS5.The clarity is very good! Although not much use for the camera just yet.don't buy, you can't even use it to talk in while chatting with friends.  I haven't even been able to use it once.  Save your money, or use the old one if it even works.  have no cluePerfect for streaming on PS5, just make sure your room is well lit so it can look sharp.Easy to use. Hook was super easy. Couldnt be happier with my HD cameraIt’s small and compact and gets the job done. I don’t like having to go through so many menus to adjust it thoughLooks good but unfortunately only for recording, not compatible with PSVR. So not much if use to me and returned.
