Beautifully made with lots of little deatails that make it fun.Awesome game!!! My 6 year old son loves to play this all the time. Very easy game for him to understand and also challenges him to find the secret flowers. Always love a good yoshi game!!Love it so far!!! a little disappointed the theme song isn’t the same as yoshi storyInstant classic! Feels like classic snes yoshi, must buy for switch owners!This game is AMAZING! Its got great graphics, and amazing landscapes. The creativity and level design is phenomenal. Its easy for those that just want to beat the game, and challenging to those that want to 100% it. Overall, its yet another home run from Nintendo! Thank you!Yoshi games are always charming, however, it’s safe to say we’re all still yearning for the charm that was Yoshi’s Island. 

The graphics in CW are superb. It amazes me how realistic and detailed every single thing is in this game! The levels are fun, but there’s not much challenge. It’s very easy to complete a level without taking any damage.

As with most Yoshi games, you still seek out the flowers, coins, etc in every level, but now there’s a hide and seek challenge with each world where you’re tasked to find hidden items in each level. It becomes real redundant and exhausting.So much to do/see/collect. Perfect for all sorts of minds, young and old, new to Yoshi or returning fans.Having played through most of the game, I can say without a doubt that I have no regrets buying this game. I don't believe that I've ever played a game with this much creativity poured into it. As the title suggests, the levels are expertly designed to resemble the crafts that you'd make as a kid with the distinct Yoshi charm. If you enjoy lighthearted games with diverse levels or love the Yoshi series, then you can't go wrong purchasing this game.                                                                                                 Pros: Diverse Level Design, Adorable Aesthetics, Entertaining for All Ages, Plenty of Collectibles, Responsive Controls for Yoshi                                                                                                                              Cons: Wonky Controls in a Few Side Levels, Occasionally Too Easy, Repetitive Music (Downgrade from Woolly World's Soundtrack)

name: iPhone 12 Pro 128GB - Verizon
review:
This is my first time buying a certified refurbished phone and I am so pleased. Definitely will do again!Item arrived in great cosmetic condition however the black line on the screen was not on the descriptionBought refurbished and it has a defective  speaker. Returning it.Perfect condition. 100% battery life. Couldn’t be happierWent to activate phone with Tmobile and was made aware that the phone was reported stolen. Quite an embarrassing moment!!! Gamestop should definitely check the IMEI before selling it to customers.The phone is in good working condition so far. There were some scratches on the screen and the phone gets hot sometimes. Other than that it’s working and looks good.Awesome phone! Appears new with 100% battery and flawless appearance.Really good! Exactly as advertised! Battery percentage was at 96!Great price. Product arrived quicker than anticipated. Exactly as described. Works great.Great price, fast delivery, good packaging. It's nice to be surprised at such quality and value once in a while. I will watch GME for future deals now.Enjoying the new phone! So far, so good. No problems. Customer Service was great!The phone has speaker problems, it will not let me use with any carrier when I purchased unlockedBest deal I could find battery life was fair 93%. No scratches or cracks. Came with USB charger better then nothingBeautiful phone! We are actually having to return it. It says the phone is unlocked but it is still not compatible with our carrier.phone came in great condition and so far no issues.I bought IPhone 12 Pro 128gb refurb. Extremely satisfied on impression. Looks new. Only feedback is for delivery services (fedex) they keep updating the tracking status wrong.Product claimed to
Be refurbished but it was severely scratched and very poorly packaged. It is obviously a used product.Is a nice phone is been a day sense I got it  everything works fine just few Visible scratch’s on the Screen that I didn’t like . But everything works and runs good.It was in perfect condition. Delivery was flawless. Exactly what I purchased, and that's exactly what I got. Couldn't have asked for better.The phone is overall very good and functions well without problems. But there are many visible scratches on the screen that we weren’t informed about on the website. I feel like it’s better to just buy a new phone.The pgone was exactly what my daughter wanted. It was in like new condition. She is very pleased with the purchase.They're not technically lying here, but the term "Certified Refurbished" generally means that the product is certified and refurbished by the manufacturer, so I feel kinda mislead. If they're using the same terminology as Apple, they should have the same standards. 85% battery health is a big disappointment. What exactly was refurbished if such an obvious thing as the battery was not? This is just a used phone that has been cleaned and hopefully tested. Does the 1 year warranty cover a new battery?You get what you paid. I got my iPhone one week ago, and I haven’t gotten any problem. The condition of the phone was really good. I was scared about the battery, but I checked it. It was great.This phone is awesome! I’m very happy with my purchase. The phone is a pretty blue and the camera’s great! ThanksPhone came right on time, nothing was wrong at all. Everything was super easy to set up and it works just like it’s suppose too. No cracks or scratches either.Great service and customer service thou phone number on website needs to be updated. It’d have been great to get earbuds with the phone but the quality it’s great so no complains. I’d definitely use game stop again!I returned the products. Was not what I was looking for.The exterior shipping box looked like it was ran through a paper shredder. Not GS's fault, interior shipping box was also trashed, very little protection for the phone withing, though it survived. shipping 3/5.... As far as certified refurbished... not sure what "certified" means to GS or whoever is handling their refurb process. The iPhone itself is maybe 7/10 cosmetically. Clear signs of having been dropped. Screen and back are pristine, rear camera lenses have some minor scratching. Battery life is reported at 100%, which is to be expected given its a newer model. Functionality seems to be 100%, so aside from cosmetic issues, and the shipping box being destroyed, everything looks good.Looks brand new. A+ on the quality. 100% battery health too!I received this phone refurbished and it looked brand new even though the rating was good not excellent. It has performed beautifully with no issues whatsoever. Would definitely buy another product from GameStop.
